## Slide with Plot of ChickWeight dataset

Print the Weight of Chicken over Time. Colored by Diet 1-4.

```{r warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(plotly)
plot_ly(ChickWeight, x=ChickWeight$weight, y=ChickWeight$Time, 
        mode="markers", color = factor(ChickWeight$Diet))
```
